m0X52bOayZt84fG2t.name: Oxygen Storage
m0X52bOayZt84fG2t.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mEPZRuTdID8gDqzoX.name: Oxygen Storage
mEPZRuTdID8gDqzoX.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m7ONsBq6uqTrrXvJa.name: Oxygen Storage
m7ONsBq6uqTrrXvJa.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m0CTqpsVt8gij1Dkm.name: Oxygen Storage
m0CTqpsVt8gij1Dkm.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mFJrM6VGO7za0PPuB.name: Oxygen Storage
mFJrM6VGO7za0PPuB.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tL8N_JQA2swYsonei.name: Flight
tL8N_JQA2swYsonei.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

mUPbJJd8oS22Fw79b.name: Diffuse
mUPbJJd8oS22Fw79b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mDeTLYwrH1-K9WsJX.name: Homogenous
mDeTLYwrH1-K9WsJX.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

muqNM8LdRXnAq16SR.name: No Blood
muqNM8LdRXnAq16SR.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mncgIF88B72Fu4Bkv.name: No Brain
mncgIF88B72Fu4Bkv.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mfVKqVbIz7VvL-y-M.name: No Eyes
mfVKqVbIz7VvL-y-M.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m23TCIJ9olYA6pt1I.name: No Head
m23TCIJ9olYA6pt1I.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mPt5pimsACZmoClDy.name: No Neck
mPt5pimsACZmoClDy.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mNlhe8AXxiSYCahwE.name: No Vitals
mNlhe8AXxiSYCahwE.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mKFckmG5CfELvWl1b.name: Unliving
mKFckmG5CfELvWl1b.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
